title: Slingshot wins $27 million Space Force contract for AI training system
summary: Slingshot Aerospace won a $27 million contract from the U.S. Space Force to develop an AI-based training system called TALOS, designed to simulate realistic satellite behavior for military training exercises. The 18-month contract aims to modernize scenario-based training under the Space Force’s Operational Test and Training Infrastructure (OTTI) program.
why_it_matters: The contract highlights the U.S. Space Force’s shift toward AI-driven, adaptive training systems to prepare operators for contested orbital environments, addressing limitations of traditional simulators.
